subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Gilbert Arenas scored 44 and went 14 for 25 Saturday night, leading the Wizards to a 124-117 victory against the turnover-prone Boston Celtics.
snippet: Gilbert Arenas scored 44 and went 14 for 25 Saturday night, leading the Wizards to a 124-117 victory against the turnover-prone Boston Celtics.
